reason_zh: Friend 表中友谊关系是双向的（student_id 和 friend_id 都是参与者）。原始 SQL 仅检查 student_id，遗漏了作为 friend_id 出现的情况。修改为 UNION 两列以正确覆盖双向关系。
reason_en: Friendship in Friend table is bidirectional (both student_id and friend_id are participants). Original SQL only checked student_id, missing friend_id appearances. Fixed with UNION of both columns.
original_query: SELECT min(grade) FROM Highschooler WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT T1.student_id FROM Friend AS T1 JOIN Highschooler AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.id)
corrected_query: SELECT MIN(grade) FROM Highschooler WHERE ID NOT IN (SELECT student_id FROM Friend UNION SELECT friend_id FROM Friend)
